Package ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.user

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FriendsSearchFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener
    This interface must be implemented by activities that contain this fragment to allow an interaction in this fragment to be communicated to the activity and potentially other fragments contained in that activity.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EditProfileActivity  
    EditProfileFragment
    View-component to editing a User's profile.
    FriendsList
    Friendslist maintains a list of Users that that a User has, Remote data access is handled by the User which owns the friendslist.
    FriendsListController
    Controller for the FriendsList model.
    FriendsListControllerTest
    Created by ross on 15-11-02.
    FriendsListFragment
    Fragment that displays the User's FriendsList in a ListView.
    FriendsListTest  
    FriendsSearchController
    Controls searching for friends via a query
    FriendsSearchFragment
    Fragment which provides an interface for searching for friends in the global User database
    InitializeUserActivity
    View component of the Initialize user workflow.
    InitializeUserController
    Controller for the InitializeUser Activity.
    User
    Model that represents application Users.
    User$$Parcelable  
    UserCreationTest  
    UserProfile
    Model that represents a given User's profile information.
    UserProfileController
    Controller for UserProfile.
    UserProfileTest  
    ViewInventoryActivity
    A skeleton activity to contain the view inventory fragment.
    ViewProfileActivity
    A skeleton activity to contain the view profile fragment.
    ViewProfileFragment
    Fragment which provides an interface for viewing a User's UserProfile.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    UserAlreadyAddedException  
    UserNotFoundException
    Exception raised when a user is not found.
